item.title: Installing DOS 6.22 from MSDN
item.description: Install MS DOS 6.22 from MSDN into VirtualBox VM If you have a Visual Studio subscription, formerly known as a MSDN subscription, you may have noticed that MS DOS is available as a download. The following is instructions on how you can install the provided MS DOS 6.22 download into a new Virtual Box VM. Steps Download and extract DOS 6.22 Download the MS DOS 6.22 download from your Visual Studio subscription.
